title: 3,500 MT of LP Gas to reach SL today (30)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro gas said that a vessel carrying 3,500 MT of gas is scheduled to reach the country on Monday (30) evening.
Litro said if the weather situation is normal the gas will be unloaded on the same day and it will take 10 hours to complete the process.
Litro Gas said it is confident that it will be able to begin distributing cooking gas to the market by Wednesday (1st June).
FULL SPEECH: Special statement by Sri Lankan premier Ranil Wickremesinghe
